data.text:
ClimateStudio and ALFA Educational Licensing

Site-wide ClimateStudio and ALFA licenses are free for educational and research institutions. Solemma works with Educational Ambassadors to share learning materials and site license installation details*. If your school is listed below, contact your Educational Ambassador to receive your license information. If your school is not listed, please forward this information to a relevant instructor at your school. If you are a teacher interested in ClimateStudio for your institution, contact us at education@solemma.com.

*Free Trials are not available for students.
